name: places/ChIJK3aLW-9YwokRLqZHTacpeDk
adrFormatAddress: 1619 3rd Ave # 1, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
My son Ari saw Linda for speech enunciation and social skill strategies when he was 10. He tended to mumble and/or to speak so quickly that friends and family members would often say, "what did you say?"
He also had a hard time with social interactions. Linda understood the issue he was having in their first session together. She then applied various strategies to help him speak clearly, distinctly and more slowly. And, she helped him make eye contact and interact with more intention. She was wonderful with him - caring, supportive and dedicated. We were thrilled with her expertise and loving attitude. And today, as a young working adult, he successfully and confidently manages client relationships, and is excelling professionally, as well as in his personal relationships.  Thank you, Linda.

originalText.text: Linda is a wonderful speech therapist, patient, knowledgeable,  professional and would tailor the treatment to help me achieve the goals we set together. I highly recommend Linda for anyone who is looking for a speech therapist!

originalText.text: I am thrilled to have found Linda Bejoian / My Speech Matters. As a 33 year old professional with a slight stutter, Linda tailored my treatment to match my goals and truly helped improve my fluency and mental approach to my impediment. I highly recommend Linda for anyone who is looking for a professional and trustworthy licensed speech pathologist.
